title: Ultimate Chicken Horse
notes: Steam English reviews are Overwhelmingly Positive (96% of 13,854). Metacritic metascore 80 and user score 7.9; blended to ~90.
raw_comment: 2D platform builder. 4 local players but up to 8 local players with a mod https://github.com/batram/UCH-EvenMorePlayers Shared screen.
